LanguageData.MakeAmmo_84mmCGShell_HEAT.label: make FFV551 HEAT shells x1
LanguageData.MakeAmmo_84mmCGShell_HEAT.description: Craft FFV551 High Explosive Anti-Tank shells, the standard issued anti-tank ammo, with small fragments and 400mm armor penetration.
LanguageData.MakeAmmo_84mmCGShell_HE.label: make FFV441B HE shells x1
LanguageData.MakeAmmo_84mmCGShell_HE.description: Craft FFV441B High Explosive shells, impact explosive warhead, packed with lots of fragment for anti-personel at distance.
LanguageData.MakeAmmo_84mmCGShell_ADM.label: make FFV401 ADM shells x1
LanguageData.MakeAmmo_84mmCGShell_ADM.description: Craft FFV401 Area Defense Munition shells, Anti-personel warhead filled with flechette/steel darts for direct fire.
